timeline.title: Mobile Apps Developer
timeline.description:
• Migrating Flutter old project (Legacy) to Null Safety
  • Implement RESTful API with Interceptors
  • Working with BLoC, Route 2.0 (GoRouter), Localizations and many important 3rd party
  • Implement Google APIs such as Geocoding, Google Maps, Geolocation, etc
  • Implement Clean Architecture concepts and Domain-Driven Design
  • Built android phone & chrome book app
  • Rebuilt android app native from Java into Kotlin with Google Maps API implemented in
  • Built simple fullstack web app using ExpressJS with Restful API, Websocket, Axios (NodeJS)

timeline.title: Mobile Apps Developer
timeline.description:
• Create and maintain HR Information System app with Flutter.
  • Integrating Firebase services such as Cloud Functions, Firestore, Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM).
  • Build an API Chat that connected to Database and Firebase Cloud Message (Push Notification).
